fields.name: Running a Command
fields.value: To run a command, simply type the bots prefix followed by the command you want to run. For example, if the prefix is `$` and you want to run `whoami`, you would type `$ whoami`.

fields.name: Uploading a File
fields.value: You can upload files to your machine using SFTP by using the `upload` command in a message where you upload a file. You can optionally specify the path and the filename you want to upload the file with as a second argument.
